allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
add xBooster WXT Chrome extension for X/Twitter engagement automation

Sidebar-only Chrome extension \(apps/xbooster\) using WXT framework with:
- Background auth capture via webRequest on x.com API calls
- Content script sidebar with Shadow DOM CSS isolation
- X.com GraphQL API integration \(NotificationsTimeline, TweetDetail, CreateTweet\)
- AI reply generation via Gemini 3 Flash with thinking \(v5 anti-AI prompt\)
- Auto-run loop with configurable intervals, delays, and cycle caps
- Settings panel with persistent configuration in chrome.storage.local
- Already-replied tracking to prevent duplicate replies
- SPA navigation pattern for natural request context

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
